data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in El Bayadh, Algeria to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of El Bayadh, Algeria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 156 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 1465 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 228,600 souls living in the state of El Bayadh with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of El Bayadh to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Berber, Taznatit people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of El Bayadh.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of El Bayadh, Algeria.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in El Bayadh, Algeria not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.
